ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | islinds.b | |- B = ( Base ` W ) |
| 2 |  | #P_elfvdm | |- ( X e. ( LIndS ` W ) -> W e. dom LIndS ) |
| 3 | 1 | #P_islinds | |- ( W e. dom LIndS -> ( X e. ( LIndS ` W ) <-> ( X C_ B /\ ( _I |` X ) LIndF W ) ) ) |
| 4 | 2, 3 | #P_syl | |- ( X e. ( LIndS ` W ) -> ( X e. ( LIndS ` W ) <-> ( X C_ B /\ ( _I |` X ) LIndF W ) ) ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_ibi | |- ( X e. ( LIndS ` W ) -> ( X C_ B /\ ( _I |` X ) LIndF W ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_simpld | |- ( X e. ( LIndS ` W ) -> X C_ B ) |
